boat.construction_details: Glued Clinker ply on oak and utele backbone

for_sales.sales_text: 13 ft glue ply clinker, all West epoxy.  Built in buoyancy, fittings by Classic Marine.   Jeckels lugsail. Comes with Oars, trailer, Cover, and if wanted a torquedo electric outboard, but battery is dead.

boat.full_description:
Having completed her build in 2002, she was converted from spritsail to gaff a year later and offered for sale in 2010.

She has now been fitted out with a single mast and a lug sail. The hull was modified by removing the skeg to maintain a balanced rig.
boat.name: Baggywrinkle
boat.short_description: Designed and built by her first owner, Iain McBride, 'Baggywrinkle' was launched in 2002. Originally built as a yawl, rig has been modified to a single mast with standing lug.
